title: Covid-19 Pandemic: Live Updates and News for Dec. 3, 2021
content:
1. Covid-19 Pandemic: Live Updates and News for Dec. 3, 2021  Bloomberg
  2. Covid cases surge in South Africa where Omicron variant emerged - BBC News  BBC News
  3. WHO says surge team deployed in S.Africa's Gauteng to tackle Omicron  Reuters
  4. Omicron covid variant has higher risk of reinfection than delta, South Africa researchers say  The Washington Post
  5. Study on Epicenter of Omicron Outbreak to Be Completed Tuesday  Bloomberg
